channel.title: Xbox 360: Black Op's
channel.description:
[center][img]http://www.usposttoday.com/wp-content/uploads/2010/08/Call-of-Duty-Black-Ops.jpg[/img][/center]
Call of Duty Black Op's is the newest Call of Duty game.
It was made by Treyarch.
It's game play is amazing during the campaign and previously online. They have changed many things that Modern Warfare 2 had in it. The game is more fun in my own opinion.
How about all of you guys? tl;dr this:
Xbox Gamertag: Prestige level(if prestiged): level: Favorite game type: Zombies(yes/no): Highest level on zombies(Don't lie):
Heres mine:
Xbox Gamertag: X xE n R a G eD Prestige level(if prestiged): second level: 50 Favorite game type(s): S&D, Ground war, HQ, HC S&D Zombies(yes/no): yes Highest level on zombies(Don't lie): 26- with a full team of four.

item.title: Xbox 360: Black Op's
item.dc:creator: @ollie123 Ollie123
item.description:
@ollie123 wrote:

I don’t know what Black Op’s is, but on Black Ops:

Gamertag: OM x WARFARE
Level: 45
Prestige: Second
Fav. Game Mode: Domination, TDM, Headquarters
Zombies: Yes
Highest Level on Zombies: 25 with 2 people

TabbyKiller:

(then accidentally pressed the open disk tray with my foot)

I do that all the time

Read full topic

item.title: Xbox 360: Black Op's
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

The Multiplayer is kind of complex to me, so much stuff to do and the hell with the money system or point system. Of course, the zombies are the top thing for me. And I didn’t like the campaign, I don’t enjoy those kinds of campaign’s.

Read full topic

item.title: Xbox 360: Black Op's
item.dc:creator: @k0_twin k0 twin
item.description:
@k0_twin wrote:

[quote=“riku9182, post:6, topic:374746”]Campaign and Zombies are the only thing they did good on.
IMO Multiplayer sucks’s as usual.[/quote]
I do enjoy some of the wager matches. And like you said, the campaign and zombies are exceptional.

As for the multiplayer, it’s really bland. Bores me.

Read full topic
